name: Adorable Crush
description:
Year 2030, human successfully creating a VRMMO Simulation game that player will play in a virtual reality world via a special Headset.
You are Hiroki - a 23 year old NEET, you join into this game and playing with his friends as another life.
*Features:
- HuniePop-like match 3 puzzle game with indirect matching mechanic (freely to move token in column and row)
- Complex dating sim gameplay mixed with Visual Novel and light RPG elements.
- Beautiful, cute girl artwork
- 5 girl included 15 Live2D CG with over 40 artwork
- Beautiful background artwork
- Over 2000 lines of dialog, fully and professionally voice acted
- Many items to unlock and collect as gifts
- Relaxing music
